item.title: Secure Card Payments
item.description: My wife checked our bank account this morning and discovered that our debit card had been used by a thief. I verified that the card was in my wallet. I called my bank and cancelled the card so that the thief would not be able to use it again. And I created a dispute for the charge on my bank’s website. My first thought was that the merchant should be responsible for this kind of thing.
